snippet: A year ago this morning, in the half light of early dawn, the German Army marched into Poland. Today, after a year of stupendous events, frontiers have vanished, free nations have been murdered, free peoples are enslaved....
lead_paragraph: A year ago this morning, in the half light of early dawn, the German Army marched into Poland. Today, after a year of stupendous events, frontiers have vanished, free nations have been murdered, free peoples are enslaved.
